[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'bum ga pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@#/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_glegs bam gsum pa/_bam po dang po/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/de shes rab 
[\[1b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye mched drug nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid 
[\[1b.3\]]kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye mched 
[\[1b.4\]]drug phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong ba nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[1b.5\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid 
[\[2a.2\]]la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye 
[\[2a.3\]]mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[2a.4\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

[\[2b\]]

[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya

[\[4b.6\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[4b.7\]]nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba phyi nang 
[\[5a.2\]]stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_
[\[5a.3\]]tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[5a.4\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[5a.5\]]tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba don dam stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis don dam stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed 
[\[5a.6\]]do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[5a.7\]]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong 
[\[5b.2\]]pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[5b.3\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab 
[\[5b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid 
[\[5b.5\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis

[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[6a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[6a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

[\[6a.5\]]kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_tshor ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis

[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad

[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_len pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis phyi

[\[8a.7\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_len pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_len pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de

[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 
[\[9a.2\]]pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_len pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[9a.3\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 
[\[9a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_len pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[9a.5\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[9a.6\]]dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi 
[\[9a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa phyin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[9b.2\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa chen po stong ba zhes bya bar 
[\[9b.3\]]yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/_srid pa don 
[\[9b.4\]]dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[9b.5\]]yid la bya ba med par/_srid pa 'dus byas stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[9b.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa 'dus ma byas stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[9b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed 
[\[10a.2\]]de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa dor ba 
[\[10a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[10a.4\]]yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par srid pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[10a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[10a.6\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems

[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[10b.2\]]gyis dang po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/_
[\[10b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_srid pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[10b.4\]]nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/_stong

[\[11a.7\]]la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye ba mtha' las 'das pa byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye ba thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes

[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_skye ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi

[\[12b\]]

[\[12b.6\]]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las

[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_

[\[13a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[13a.5\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis 
[\[13a.6\]]kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rga shi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong 
[\[13a.7\]]pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rga shi dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes 
[\[13b.2\]]bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_
[\[13b.3\]]rga shi dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[13b.4\]]chen po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_

[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]par/_dbang po rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms

[\[14b.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[14b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[15a.2\]]la/_ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag 
[\[15a.3\]]kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/_
[\[15a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[15a.5\]]bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[15a.6\]]pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de shes 
[\[15a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_snying rje chen po sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do/_/de 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_sangs 
[\[15b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[15b.3\]]po/_de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar thabs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas pas ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/_'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[15b.4\]]dpa' chen po/_sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/_'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur te/_sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[15b.5\]]rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par 
[\[15b.6\]]byed pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed 
[\[15b.7\]]cing zlog par byed pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/_'di ni chos ma yin/_'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/_'di la bslab par bya ba'i 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]cha'o/_/mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/_'di dag ni mnyan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/bcang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/klag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/kun chub par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/'di dag ni gzhan la 
[\[16a.2\]]bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can/_
[\[16a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed de/_rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[16a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_sbyin 
[\[16a.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston/_bdud kyi nyes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston pa 'di ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[16a.6\]]yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa 
[\[16a.7\]]dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to/_/'grel to rnam par 'byed do/_/gsal bar byed do/_/
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]yongs su ston to/_/zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag_/sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub 
[\[16b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni/_byang chub kyi sems kyang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_khyod ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa yang ma yin/_khyod kyis ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[16b.3\]]bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag_/sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /_
[\[16b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu/_gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/'du shes ni bdag gam bdag gis 
[\[16b.5\]]stong ngo /_/'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/lus ni bdag gam bdag 
[\[16b.6\]]gis stong ngo /_/yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong 
[\[16b.7\]]ngo /_/chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/lce'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus 
[\[17a.2\]]te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag 
[\[17a.3\]]gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/
[\[17a.4\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sa'i khams ni bdag gam 
[\[17a.5\]]bdag gis stong ngo /_/chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[17a.6\]]khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/skye 
[\[17a.7\]]mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/len pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/srid pa ni bdag gam 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]bdag gis stong ngo /_/skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/bzod pa'i 
[\[17b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag 
[\[17b.3\]]gis stong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam 
[\[17b.4\]]bdag gis stong ngo /_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam 
[\[17b.5\]]bdag gis stong ngo /_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag 
[\[17b.6\]]gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag 
[\[17b.7\]]gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i 
[\[18a.2\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/gzugs med 
[\[18a.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[18a.4\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/de 
[\[18a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/
[\[18a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /_/de ltar bdag gam bdag gis stong na/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[18a.7\]]smra mi ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]phyin te/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu/_shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/_'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos zhes bya ba 
[\[18b.2\]]yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dag kyang stong ste/_phyogs bcu kun kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[18b.3\]]dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/_'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_nyan thos zhes bya ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra mi ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[18b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog 
[\[18b.5\]]cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud 
[\[18b.6\]]sdig to can dag mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/_dran 
[\[18b.7\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /_dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang /_stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang /_'phags 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /_bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /_
[\[19a.2\]]rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing /_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/_
[\[19a.3\]]nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/
[\[19a.4\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_'di skad du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/_
[\[19a.5\]]khyod la ci zhig bya de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo gcad pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/_gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[19a.6\]]bu mngon du byar yod pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig_/ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[19a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag_/dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/_gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]gyis ston pa dang /_gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_/dben zhes bya bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[19b.7\]]bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[21b.1\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya

[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra [{]myi [,]mi [}]ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub 
[\[28a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po rnams rigs par bya ste/_de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[28a.3\]]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bdun no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gsum pa/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[28a.4\]]sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to_/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/_tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang 
[\[28a.5\]]chub kyang ma skyes la/_sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sems can la yang tshig [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/_tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o_/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor byang chub la ni skye ba'am/_yod pa nyid dam/_yod pa nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[28a.6\]]so_/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la bya'i rjes [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam la gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma

[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa de [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[32a.2\]]'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]de [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[32a.3\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rna ba de [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[32a.4\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sna la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[32a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sna de [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[32a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lce de [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/

[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yid de [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin

[\[33a\]]

[\[33b\]]

[\[35a\]]

[\[35b\]]

[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skye mched drug la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skye mched drug de [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang

[\[49b.7\]]med do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/_/
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la gnas med do/_/rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid skye ba med pa la gnas med do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag pa med pa 
[\[50a.2\]]la gnas med do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/_/rang 
[\[50a.3\]]bzhin stong pa nyid mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa la gnas med do/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye ba med pa la gnas med do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_

[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/'du shes shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/'du byed shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i 
[\[54a.2\]]gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_mig shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas 
[\[54a.3\]]med do/_/rna ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/sna shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/lce shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/lus shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/
[\[54a.4\]]yid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_

[\[54a.6\]]tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/chos shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[54a.7\]]dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_mig gi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/sna'i rnam par 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu 
[\[54b.2\]]rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 
[\[54b.3\]]'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam 
[\[54b.4\]]par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[54b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rna ba'i 
[\[54b.6\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa 
[\[54b.7\]]la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan 
[\[55a.2\]]ma'i gnas med do/_/chu'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rlung gi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[55a.3\]]khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[55a.4\]]la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_ma rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/'du byed shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par 
[\[55a.5\]]dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/skye mched drug shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/
