[\[59b.2\]]tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_kun snang dag ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[59b.3\]]tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig 
[\[59b.4\]]gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chung dge'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig 
[\[59b.5\]]gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig 
[\[59b.6\]]gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don 
[\[59b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chung che'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don 
[\[60a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[60a.3\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do//
[\[60a.4\]]rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[60a.5\]]tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[60a.6\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ldan 
[\[60a.7\]]pa yang ma yin te/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bstan du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'di ltar mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_chos thams cad kyi [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag pa 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni 
[\[60b.2\]]ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba dang 
[\[60b.3\]]lung du bstan pa dang /_lung du ma bstan pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[60b.4\]]thun mong dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /_chos de dag thams cad kyi [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[60b.5\]]dpa' chen pos/_shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[60b.6\]]phar shes pa/_mar shes pa/_dge sbyong du shes pa/_bram zer shes pa/_rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang /_sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_sgom pa las byung ba'i 
[\[60b.7\]]bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /_nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/_'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_'bu can gyi 'du shes dang /_rnam 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[61a.2\]]'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 
[\[61a.3\]]'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang /_skye ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/_
[\[61a.4\]]de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/_'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni/_'jig 
[\[61a.5\]]rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/rab 'byor ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/rab 'byor 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni/_'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/rab 'byor [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ni/_'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/
[\[61a.6\]]rab 'byor phra ma ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/_/rab 'byor zhe gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/rab 'byor tshig kyal pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/rab 'byor chags sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[61a.7\]]gnod sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/rab 'byor log par lta ba ni/_'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/khro ba dang /_mdud par 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_'tshig pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_nga rgyal dang /_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]log pa'i nga rgyal te/_rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/ngag gi las ni 
[\[61b.2\]]lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o 
[\[61b.3\]]phung po rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/khams rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/_/rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/
[\[61b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_khams [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_dge 
[\[61b.5\]]ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par de ma yin pa/_'jig rten pa'i chos gang 
[\[61b.6\]]ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/_dran pa 
[\[61b.7\]]nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang /_yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang /_yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang /_rtogs pa dang bcas/_dpyod pa dang bcas 
[\[62a.2\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang /_tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad de/_brgyad 
[\[62a.3\]]gang zhe na/_gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/spug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni/_rnam par 
[\[62a.4\]]thar pa gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' 
[\[62a.5\]]yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs 
[\[62a.6\]]te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga ba'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/
[\[62a.7\]]de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[62b.2\]]ste/_de 'dod pas dben/_sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa 
[\[62b.3\]]dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/_nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rnam par dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar 
[\[62b.4\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/_dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa 
[\[62b.5\]]btang snyoms pa'o/_/zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[62b.6\]]sdug bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pas/_yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par 
[\[62b.7\]]gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes/_cung zad 
[\[63a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du 
[\[63a.3\]]shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi 
[\[63a.4\]]nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tham [{]myed [,]med [}]ba stong pa nyid 
[\[63a.5\]]dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos 
[\[63a.6\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag ste/_de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 
[\[63a.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_'di lta ste/_phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]khams [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/_de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma 
[\[63b.2\]]mchis pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[63b.3\]]yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[63b.4\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[63b.5\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag ste/_de dag ni zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/_'dod pa'i 
[\[63b.6\]]khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams dang /_gzhan yang de ma yin pa/_'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[63b.7\]]pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_stong pa 
[\[64a.2\]]nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[64a.3\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag ste/_de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/_gang la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'jig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[64a.4\]]gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'dod chags zad pa/_zhe sdang zad pa/_gti mug zad pa/_de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/_chos nyid/_chos kyi dbyings/_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings 
[\[64a.5\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad 
[\[64a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/_de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/_
[\[64a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[64b.2\]]'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[64b.3\]]brgyad dag ste/_de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[64b.4\]]chos thams cad gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[64b.5\]]'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas 
[\[64b.6\]]de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po 
[\[64b.7\]]nges pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/_rigs kyis dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/_rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa 
[\[65a.2\]]zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[65a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_'khor ba dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]par sems can thams 
[\[65a.4\]]cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis 
[\[65a.5\]]yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang /_sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_chos thams cad skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bdag gis shes par 
[\[65a.6\]]bya'o/_/bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos kyi tshul 
[\[65a.7\]]gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/_/snyam du sems bskyed de/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bu ste/_de la gnas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_
[\[65b.2\]]sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams 
[\[65b.3\]]su myong bar bya'o/_/snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos/_gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por/_sems can gang yang 
[\[65b.4\]]phung po ma lus pa'i myang na las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang /_bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/_/zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/_sems can 
[\[65b.5\]]thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o/_/de nas gzod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_
[\[65b.6\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/_byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bstsags te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dpa' chen pos/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis/_sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba/_de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems 
[\[66a.2\]]rlabs po che ni/_sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/_zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/_gti mug gi sems mi skyed/_gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/_nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[66a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/_/des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang /_sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_mi sgul 
[\[66a.4\]]ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgul ba ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed cing /_des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[66a.5\]]dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/_/des sems can thams cad kyi phul du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems 
[\[66a.6\]]bskyed par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/_des rlom sems su 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_rab 'byor 
[\[66a.7\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems te/_de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]dpa' chen pos/_rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/_/chos la dga' bar bya'o/_/chos la mos par bya'o/_/chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/_/de la chos gang zhe na/_chos thams cad dbyer [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni 
[\[66b.2\]]chos zhes bya'o/_/de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/_gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/_'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/_gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/_'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[66b.3\]]de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/_gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste/_'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/_chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/_'di ni chos la mos pa'i 
[\[66b.4\]]rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[66b.5\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/_chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[66b.6\]]la gnas/_don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_'du byas stong pa nyid la gnas/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[66b.7\]]la gnas/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/_mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gnas/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/_
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/_dran 
[\[67a.2\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/_dbang po rnams la gnas/_stabs rnams la gnas/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[67a.3\]]lag brgyad pa la gnas/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/_tshad med pa rnams la gnas/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/_rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas/_mthar 
[\[67a.4\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gnas/_mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/_ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/_gzungs kyi 
[\[67a.5\]]sgo rnams la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/_mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/_byams pa chen po la gnas/_snying rje chen po la gnas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[67a.6\]]ba [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas te/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[67a.7\]]pas/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i 
[\[67b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 
[\[67b.3\]]'dzin la gnas/_rab tu bde bar gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'jugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'khrul pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'od zer 
[\[67b.4\]]rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa med par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_brtson pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 
[\[67b.5\]]'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_
[\[67b.6\]]chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'khor gsum 
[\[67b.7\]]yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]gnas/_seng ge rnam par rkyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_seng ge rnam par glal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_sne la zhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chags pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting 
[\[68a.2\]]nge 'dzin la gnas/_rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_tshol ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_gnas la rten pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[68a.3\]]sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_dga' ba 
[\[68a.4\]]byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo 
[\[68a.5\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'jig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_mig yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_shes rab 
[\[68a.6\]]sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 
[\[68a.7\]]'dzin la gnas/_sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos thams 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rin po che nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_
[\[68b.2\]]'khrug pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_dri ma med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_yi ge 
[\[68b.3\]]mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rnam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ming dang mtshan ma la 
[\[68b.4\]]'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_bya ba dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 
[\[68b.5\]]'dzin la gnas/_g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_sems [{]myed [,]med [}]par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nges par gnas 
[\[68b.6\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_mtha' yas sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_
[\[68b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_gnas su bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]nge 'dzin la gnas/_gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rnam pa 'dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_spyod pa dam 
[\[69a.2\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rin chen snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_
[\[69a.3\]]glog gi 'od zer bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_sgra dbyangs kyi 
[\[69a.4\]]yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_mngon par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_
[\[69a.5\]]rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_gzungs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_
[\[69a.6\]]gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_mthun pa dang 'gal ba 
[\[69a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rgyan chen po'i ting nge 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]'dzin la gnas/_rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_'jig rten thams cad skyob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[69b.2\]]gnas/_nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_gnas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas 
[\[69b.3\]]de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_snod las rang 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ye shes chen po'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_stobs bcu'i 
[\[69b.4\]]'byung gnas su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_sgo rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_ngag gi 
[\[69b.5\]]skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_kun tu rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nam mkha' ltar chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rnam par grol 
[\[69b.6\]]zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi 
[\[69b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po drug pa/_
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/_/bcom 
[\[70a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu don gang gi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/_sems can rnams 
[\[70a.3\]]la chos ston pa dang /_sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_shed can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_shed bdag 
[\[70a.4\]]tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_tshor du 'jug 
[\[70a.5\]]pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /[ {]myed [,]med [}]par lta bar rab tu spang ba 
[\[70a.6\]]dang /_phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu 
[\[70a.7\]]spang ba dang /_stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_tshad 
[\[70b.2\]]med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_rnam par thar par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid 
[\[70b.3\]]dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang 
[\[70b.4\]]ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_
[\[70b.5\]]sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_dge 'dun du lta ba 
[\[70b.6\]]rab tu spang ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/_sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/_de'i slad du byang 
[\[70b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna bar lta bar 
[\[71a.2\]]'gyur ba yin/_snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_ror lta bar 'gyur ba 
[\[71a.3\]]yin/_reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 
[\[71a.4\]]'gyur ba yin/_lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna ba'i 'du te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 
[\[71a.5\]]'gyur ba yin/_lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te 
[\[71a.6\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_lce'i 'dus te reg par rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_
[\[71a.7\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_skye mched 
[\[71b.2\]]drug tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_len par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rga shir lta bar 
[\[71b.3\]]'gyur ba yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_tshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_

[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_

[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]phyin pa la spyod cing /_thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/tshor bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/'du shes su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/'du byed du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[72b.3\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/yid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i

[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]lta ba skyed do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba 
[\[73a.2\]]skyed do/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing /_
[\[73a.3\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[73a.4\]]rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/chu'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[73a.5\]]gyis lta ba skyed do/_/rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/
[\[73a.6\]]ma rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs 
[\[73a.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/sred par dmigs 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/rga shir dmigs shing 
[\[73b.2\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs 
[\[73b.3\]]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 
[\[73b.4\]]dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i 
[\[73b.5\]]tshul gyi lta ba skyed do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[73b.6\]]gyis lta ba skyed do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[73b.7\]]gyis lta bskyed do/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]gyis lta ba skyed do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs 
[\[74a.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[74a.3\]]gyis lta ba skyed do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/dbang por 
[\[74a.4\]]dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i 
[\[74a.5\]]tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/bsam gtan du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/tshad med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/gzugs med 
[\[74a.6\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/
[\[74a.7\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/mngon par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]gyis lta ba skyed do/_/gzungs kyi sgor [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/so so yang dag par 
[\[74b.2\]]rig par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/byams pa chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/snying rje chen por [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[74b.3\]]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/byang chub tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[74b.4\]]gyis lta ba skyed do/_/sangs rgyas su dmigs shing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/chos su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/dge 'dun du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs 
[\[74b.5\]]shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_tshor bar lta 
[\[74b.6\]]ba dang /_'du shes su lta ba dang /_'du byed du lta ba dang /_rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna bar lta ba dang /_snar lta ba dang /_lcer lta ba dang /_lus su lta ba dang /_yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de'i phyir 
[\[74b.7\]]gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sgrar lta ba dang /_drir lta ba dang /_ror lta ba dang /_reg tu lta ba dang /_chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang /_sna'i rnam par shes 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]par lta ba dang /_lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes par lta ba dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang /_
[\[75a.2\]]sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[75a.3\]]rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 
[\[75a.4\]]'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_chu'i khams su lta ba dang /_me'i khams su lta ba dang /_rlung gi khams su lta ba dang /_nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir ma 
[\[75a.5\]]rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_'du byed du lta ba dang /_rnam par shes par lta ba dang /_ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang /_skye mched drug tu lta ba dang /_reg par lta ba dang /_tshor bar lta ba dang /_sred par lta ba dang /_len par lta ba dang /_srid par lta ba dang /_
[\[75a.6\]]skye bar lta ba dang /_rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[75a.7\]]rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[75b.2\]]nyid du lta ba dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid du lta bar 
[\[75b.3\]]'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang /_dbang por lta ba dang /_stobs su lta ba dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba dang /_lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir 
[\[75b.4\]]'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_bsam gtan du lta ba dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par lta ba dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang /_rnam par thar par lta ba dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 
[\[75b.5\]]nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par lta ba dang /_/mngon par shes par lta ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs par lta ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig par 
[\[75b.6\]]lta ba dang /_byams pa chen por lta ba dang /_snying rje chen por lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[75b.7\]]tu lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas su lta ba dang /_chos su lta ba dang /_dge 'dun du lta ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/_byang 
[\[76a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bde la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig_/rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems 
[\[76a.3\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/_de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de 
[\[76a.4\]]ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/_de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/_de'i slad du byang 
[\[76a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang /_
[\[76a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/_rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/_chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_
[\[76a.7\]]'gag pa dang /_'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'phel ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'grib ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'bro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la nyan thos kyi sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[76b.2\]]ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/_thams 
[\[76b.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_khongs su chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du 
[\[76b.4\]]shes kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[76b.5\]]do/_/yid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sgra yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dri yang chags pa myid do/_/ro yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 
[\[76b.6\]]yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes 
[\[76b.7\]]pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]'dis te reg pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[77a.2\]]tshor ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sa'i khams kyang chags pa 
[\[77a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chu'i khams kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rlung gi khams kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nam mkha'i khams kyang chags ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ma rigs pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[77a.4\]]'du byed kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye mched drug kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sred pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[77a.5\]]len pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/srid pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye ba yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rga shi yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[77a.6\]]tu phyin pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyi stong 
[\[77a.7\]]ba nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[77b.2\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[77b.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dbang po rnams kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/stobs rnams

[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_gzugs kyang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba yang chags pa

[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]len pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing khongs su chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/srid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_/zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing khongs su chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing khongs su

[\[84b.1\]]khongs su chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cig khongs su chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing khongs su chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang

[\[88a\]]

[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
