[\[90b.7\]]'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o zhe'am/_sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/_
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[91a.2\]]cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha 
[\[91a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang brtson 
[\[91a.4\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi 
[\[91a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar 
[\[91a.6\]]bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa 
[\[91a.7\]]nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs 
[\[91b.2\]]par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang 
[\[91b.3\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[91b.4\]]cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[91b.5\]]nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 
[\[91b.6\]]sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/
[\[91b.7\]]sems can thams cad kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang 
[\[92a.2\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[92a.3\]]sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[92a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[92a.5\]]cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[92a.6\]]rnams la gnas par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang tshad 
[\[92a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[92b.2\]]sems can thams cad kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang rnam pa thar pa'i 
[\[92b.3\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[92b.4\]]la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[92b.5\]]pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/_/
[\[92b.6\]]bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar 
[\[92b.7\]]bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[93a.2\]]tshe/_sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang 
[\[93a.3\]]thun mong du byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/
[\[93a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don tu yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]sngo ba 'di ni 
[\[93a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[93a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_chos de dag la bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa 
[\[93a.7\]]yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]'grus nyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[93b.2\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing /_/de la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gcig pa'i phyir/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi 
[\[93b.3\]]go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[93b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_des sbyin pa yang mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gtong 
[\[93b.5\]]ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_len pa yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang 
[\[93b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[93b.7\]]pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul 
[\[94a.2\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[94a.3\]]spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis la yang mos pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed na/_so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[94a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos de dag la bzod pa 
[\[94a.5\]]dang mos pa dang /_rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[94a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[94a.7\]]pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/_
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[94b.2\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams 
[\[94b.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /_tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshul 
[\[94b.4\]]khrims de yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[94b.5\]]tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 
[\[94b.6\]]'dzin te/_de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[94b.7\]]bya bsam yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[95a.2\]]chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 
[\[95a.3\]]sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[95a.4\]]pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten 
[\[95a.5\]]pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[95a.6\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_brtson 'grus nyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bzod 
[\[95a.7\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[95b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_
[\[95b.3\]]chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing /_bzod pa mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[95b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[95b.5\]]dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sbyin pa 
[\[95b.6\]]yongs su gtong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[95b.7\]]pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su 
[\[96a.2\]]sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_
[\[96a.3\]]rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten pa 'di ni byang chub 
[\[96a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid 
[\[96a.5\]]la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing /_brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni/_byang chub 
[\[96a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[96a.7\]]tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 
[\[96b.2\]]yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_brtson 'grus des rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /_brtson 'grus de yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 
[\[96b.3\]]sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[96b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/_/
[\[96b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[96b.6\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[96b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims srung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can 
[\[97a.2\]]thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[97a.3\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 
[\[97a.4\]]yid la bya bas/_bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[97a.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa 
[\[97a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[97a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/_de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan 
[\[97b.2\]]pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam 
[\[97b.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_/chos thams cad la sgyu mar 
[\[97b.4\]]byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed cing /_bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[97b.5\]]byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[97b.6\]]chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[97b.7\]]dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]pa yongs su gtong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sdo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[98a.2\]]po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[98a.3\]]rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[98a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[98a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/_
[\[98a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha 
[\[98a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[98b.2\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[98b.3\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[98b.4\]]yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[98b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya 
[\[98b.6\]]bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[98b.7\]]dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]tu phyin pa 'di dag dang /_sems can dang /_byang chub la mtshan mar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/_/tshe dang 
[\[99a.2\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[99a.3\]]dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/
[\[99a.4\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/_/bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[99a.5\]]ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[99a.6\]]pa dang /_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang 
[\[99a.7\]]mi byed de/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/_
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po brgyad pa/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[99b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing /_ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_
[\[99b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su su smyind par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod 
[\[99b.4\]]pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing /_ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams che 
[\[99b.5\]]ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su su smyind par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing 
[\[99b.6\]]dbyangs rjes su sgrog go_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo 
[\[99b.7\]]zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phral gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]dbyangs rjes su sgrog go_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing [{]mying [,]ming [}]yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[100a.2\]]che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs 
[\[100a.3\]]rjes su sgrog go_/byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing [{]mying [,]ming [}]yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do/_/'jig rten gyi khams che 
[\[100a.4\]]mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs 
[\[100a.5\]]rjes su sgrog go_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing [{]mying [,]ming [}]yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[100a.6\]]khams che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyi nad par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa 
[\[100a.7\]]mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing myid yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do/_
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos po 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa 
[\[100b.2\]]mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing [{]mying [,]ming [}]yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams che 
[\[100b.3\]]ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs 
[\[100b.4\]]rjes su sgrog go_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing [{]mying [,]ming [}]yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub 
[\[100b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go_/steng 
[\[100b.6\]]gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing [{]mying [,]ming [}]yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[100b.7\]]chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/_smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/_/gang pos smras pa/_
[\[101a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/_de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_'dod pas dben sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_
[\[101a.3\]]dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_
[\[101a.4\]]rnam par dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus 
[\[101a.5\]]kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal ba yang spangs 
[\[101a.6\]]shing yid bde ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sdug bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/_
[\[101a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis 
[\[101b.2\]]klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa 
[\[101b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang 
[\[101b.4\]]ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i 
[\[101b.5\]]phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/_
[\[101b.6\]]nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' 
[\[101b.7\]]yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma yod do zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/_
[\[102a.2\]]nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'di dag dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_tshul dang /_mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing /_rnam pa ldang ba'i tshe yang /_
[\[102a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_'dod pas dben/_sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog 
[\[102a.4\]]pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa rtog pa dang /_rnam pa dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi 
[\[102a.5\]]rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rnam par dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/_dran 
[\[102a.6\]]pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la 
[\[102a.7\]]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sdug bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi

[\[102b.4\]]po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par

[\[102b.7\]]'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las 
[\[103a.2\]]yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod de zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i

[\[103a.4\]]dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang /_mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang ba'i tshe yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/

[\[103b\]]

[\[103b.2\]]nub pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sdug bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms

[\[104b\]]

[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin

[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]yod do zhes chud zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/
[\[106b.2\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/_nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'di dag dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_tshul dang /_
[\[106b.3\]]mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang pa'i tshe yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yogs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_'dod 
[\[106b.4\]]pas dben sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa 
[\[106b.5\]]nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rnam par dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_de dga' ba 
[\[106b.6\]]las 'dod chags dang bral bas/_dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[106b.7\]]bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sdug bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_btang snyoms dang dran 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs 
[\[107a.2\]]pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do/_/de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis 
[\[107a.3\]]pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing 
[\[107a.4\]]rnam par spyod do/_/de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis 
[\[107a.5\]]klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_
[\[107a.6\]]gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod 
[\[107a.7\]]do/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams 
[\[107b.2\]]cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma yod do zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[107b.3\]]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/_nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[107b.4\]]'di dag dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_tshul dang /_mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[107b.5\]]chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[107b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings 
[\[107b.7\]]kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do/_/
[\[108a.2\]]de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i 
[\[108a.3\]]mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin tu yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gcugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gnod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ltod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yongs 
[\[108a.4\]]su rdzogs pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam pa spyod do/_/de 'dod pas dben/_sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_
[\[108a.5\]]rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud 
[\[108a.6\]]gcig tu gyur pas/_rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rnam par dpyod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan 
[\[108a.7\]]zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sdug bsngal yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas 
[\[108b.2\]]so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 
[\[108b.3\]]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam pa shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam 
[\[108b.4\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma yod do zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[108b.5\]{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/_
[\[108b.6\]]nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa'i phyir/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing 'chad pa dang /_ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/_de dag gi ro dang /_de dag gi 
[\[108b.7\]]skyon dang /_'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]gis/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam pa ldang yang 'di lta ste/_/nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi yang rung ste/_sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 
[\[109a.2\]]'byed pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[109a.3\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam ste/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/_/snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /_
[\[109a.4\]]mos pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[109a.5\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/_brtson 
[\[109a.6\]]'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam 
[\[109a.7\]]gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang /_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang /_bsam gtan gsum 
[\[109b.2\]]pa'i yan lag dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes 
[\[109b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtog kyang 
[\[109b.4\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing /_de dag gis rlom sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[109b.5\]]dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_rnam pa 
[\[109b.6\]]thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[109b.7\]]cad du dbang po lnga sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang /_
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du rnam 
[\[110a.2\]]pa thar pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sgom pa dang /_rnam pa 
[\[110a.3\]]thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang /_
[\[110a.4\]]rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[110a.5\]]cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[110a.6\]]sgom pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 
[\[110a.7\]]gzhog cing /_bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do/_/snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /_sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/_/dga' 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /_bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/_/btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /_sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/_
[\[110b.2\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang /_tshul dang /_mtshan ma la mnyam par 
[\[110b.3\]]gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims 
[\[110b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mnyams pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam pa spyod cing /_sa gnyis po nyan 
[\[110b.5\]]thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems 
[\[110b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/_
[\[110b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye zhing /_/de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 
[\[111a.2\]]'gyur ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_
[\[111a.3\]]bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/_de dag la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[111a.4\]]stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang 'jug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa'i/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[111a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_nang stong pa nyid shes

[\[111b\]]

[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa dang /_smon pa yod ces bya bar shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/
[\[112a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi dus

[\[112a.6\]]'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'dus byas kyi chos dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed kyang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[112a.7\]]'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/_gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des sbyin pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sbyin

[\[112b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /_des

[\[112b.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas

[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]par gnas kyang /_des brtson 'grus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_yid la bya ba de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/_bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/_

[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong

[\[114a.3\]]la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du 
[\[114a.4\]]de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid sgom

[\[114a.6\]]bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi 
[\[114a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/_de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[114b.2\]]gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/_de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi sgom mo/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[114b.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis dang po lnga sgom mo/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par

[\[114b.5\]]bdun sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[114b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres 
[\[114b.7\]]pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhin sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/_bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 
[\[115a.2\]]sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/_bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/_/de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya 
[\[115a.3\]]ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom 
[\[115a.4\]]pa'i don du de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[115a.5\]]pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/_bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[115a.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/_bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas 
[\[115a.7\]]bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/_bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom mo/_/rnam pa 
[\[115b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'i don du de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po sgom mo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam 
[\[115b.3\]]pa bsgom pa'i don du/_de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sgom mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas 
[\[115b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya

[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong 
[\[118a.2\]]pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/ngo bo nyid 
[\[118a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/dran pa 
[\[118a.4\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/rdzu

[\[118a.7\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/bsam gtan rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]pa'i phyir/_bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[118b.2\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[118b.3\]]rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_rnam par thar 
[\[118b.4\]]pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[118b.5\]]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_de 
[\[118b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[118b.7\]]phyir/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/snying rje chen po [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/de bzhin nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[119a.2\]]pa'i phyir/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/chos nyed [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_chos
