[\[119a.4\]]chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/byang chub [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su 
[\[119a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/sangs rgyas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam du zad do/_/zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_
[\[119a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po dgu pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[119a.7\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /_sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/_/sangs 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_mchod pa dang /_rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[119b.2\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[119b.3\]]du 'gro zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/_sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed kyang /_de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung /_sems can gyi 'du shes kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung /_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ngo /_/de 
[\[119b.4\]]gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sa la gnas shing /_lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin te/_/de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/_theg pa 
[\[119b.5\]]de dang nam du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral te/_des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi'am [,]mi'am [}]
[\[119b.6\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro/_/de bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_shar phyogs kyi

[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i theg pa/_theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog

[\[120a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing /_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i theg pa/_theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]'di zhes bya ba zhig_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten

[\[120b.7\]]mdzad cing /_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i theg pa/_theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]nyid thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[121a.2\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing /_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i theg pa/_theg 
[\[121a.3\]]pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do/_/'og gi phyogs kyi

[\[121a.5\]]bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i theg pa/_theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su 
[\[121a.6\]]rjod pa mdzad do/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing /_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/_byang chub sems 
[\[121a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i theg pa/_theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su rjod pa mdzad do/_/de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[121b.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so/_/go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[121b.3\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_tshul 
[\[121b.4\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/_nang stong 
[\[121b.5\]]pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_
[\[121b.6\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_chos thams cad stong 
[\[121b.7\]]nyid kyi go cha bgos/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bgos/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/_yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/_dbang po'i go cha bgos/_stobs kyi go cha bgos/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/_lam gyi go 
[\[122a.2\]]cha bgos/_'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/_bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i go cha bgos/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/_rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[122a.3\]]'jug pa'i go cha bgos/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i go cha bgos/_mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/_ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/_gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go 
[\[122a.4\]]cha bgos/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/_so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/_snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi go cha bgos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 
[\[122a.5\]]go cha bgos nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig 
[\[122a.6\]]rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas 
[\[122a.7\]]par 'gengs so/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_/
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[122b.2\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/
[\[122b.3\]]shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab 
[\[122b.4\]]tu skyod do/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig 
[\[122b.5\]]rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[122b.6\]]ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/_/des stong gsum 
[\[122b.7\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/
[\[123a.2\]]de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[123a.3\]]'di na/_byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal 
[\[123a.4\]]lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/_byol song gi skye gnas de dag gnas rnam par ldang ngo /_/
[\[123a.5\]]de dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_
[\[123a.6\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod 
[\[123a.7\]]do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag gshin rje'i 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can 
[\[123b.2\]]dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i 
[\[123b.3\]]sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/_sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[123b.4\]]kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams 
[\[123b.5\]]cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' 
[\[123b.6\]]ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/_sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[123b.7\]]bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gU'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dang /_
[\[124a.2\]]dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas/_rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag 
[\[124a.3\]]tu skye'o/_/des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[124a.4\]]de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/_sems can dmyal ba de dag nas 
[\[124a.5\]]rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[124a.6\]]khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed da dag na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/
[\[124a.7\]]dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems 
[\[124b.2\]]can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_dbyangs sgrog go_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba 
[\[124b.3\]]pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs 
[\[124b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]
[\[124b.5\]]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i 
[\[124b.6\]]sems can de dag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs 
[\[124b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal 
[\[125a.2\]]ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[125a.3\]]kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod 
[\[125a.4\]]pa de dag thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs 
[\[125a.5\]]rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang 
[\[125a.6\]]na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can dmyal ba'i [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag 
[\[125a.7\]]thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/_sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas 
[\[125b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi 
[\[125b.3\]]skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe 
[\[125b.4\]]byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas 
[\[125b.5\]]rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/
[\[125b.6\]]des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal/_
[\[125b.7\]]ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_dbyangs sgrog go_/de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par 
[\[126a.2\]]ldang ngo /_/de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des nub phyogs kyi 
[\[126a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i/_sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag

[\[126a.6\]]song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des byang phyogs kyi 'jig 
[\[126a.7\]]rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]thams cad zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_dbyangs sgrog go_/de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i

[\[126b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs 
[\[126b.6\]]rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas

[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

[\[127a.4\]]kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[127a.5\]]'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[127a.6\]]de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang 
[\[127a.7\]]bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song 
[\[127b.2\]]gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_
[\[127b.3\]]de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas 
[\[127b.4\]]dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des 
[\[127b.5\]]'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod 
[\[127b.6\]]pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_dbyangs sgrog go_/de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten 
[\[127b.7\]]du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/_dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag byol song 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/des steng gi phyogs kyi 
[\[128a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar 
[\[128a.3\]]byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/_/dbyangs sgrog go/_/de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs 
[\[128a.4\]]rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/_de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo /_/de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam 
[\[128a.5\]]par langs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis 
[\[128a.6\]]lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/_de ltar mngon par sprul nas/_ngan song gi sems can de dag la 
[\[128a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog_/chos kyi sgra sgrog_/dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par gyur la/_de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/_rab 'byor de la ci snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang /_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[128b.2\]]rten de nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[128b.3\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin 
[\[128b.4\]]pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_stong 
[\[128b.5\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul pa byed do/_/de ltar bai DuR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/_'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul pa byed do/_/de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid 
[\[128b.6\]]mngon par sprul nas/_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do/_/bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do/_/gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/
[\[128b.7\]]me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do/_/phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do/_/spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do/_/mal cha 'dod pa rnams 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do/_/khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do/_/'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do/_/yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod 
[\[129a.2\]]pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/_/nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUR+Ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUR+Ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi 
[\[129a.3\]]ru dang /_gser/_dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/_des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/_skom 'dod pa rnams la skom byin/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa byin/_gos 'dod pa 
[\[129a.4\]]la gos byin/_me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/_phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/_spos 'dod pa la spos byin/_byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa byin/_mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha byin/_khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/_'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/_yo byad 
[\[129a.5\]]'dod pa la yo byad byin/_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUR+Ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DuR+Ya dang /_dung dang /_
[\[129a.6\]]man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul byin pa nas/[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/_sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/sems can de dag gis kyang 
[\[129a.7\]]chos bstan pa de thos nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni 
[\[129b.2\]]bzhon pa byin/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/_me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/_phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/_spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal 
[\[129b.3\]]cha byin/_khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/_'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/_yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUR+Ya dang /_dung 
[\[129b.4\]]dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUR+Ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul byin pa nas/_mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/_rab 'byor de la ci snyam du sems 
[\[129b.5\]]sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[129b.6\]]dpa' chen pos/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/_me tog 'dod 
[\[129b.7\]]pa rnams la ni me tog byin/_phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/_spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/_byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/_mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/_khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/_'tsho ba 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/_yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni/_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai D+'uR+Ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru 
[\[130a.2\]]dang /_gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai D+'uR+Ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul byin pa nas [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang /_sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[130a.3\]]rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[130a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_ched du bsam te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/_sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi 
[\[130a.5\]]lam la rab tu 'god do/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[130a.6\]]bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_
[\[130a.7\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/_sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos 
[\[130b.2\]]bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs 
[\[130b.3\]]zhig mngon par sprul te/_sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang 
[\[130b.4\]]dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[130b.5\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_
[\[130b.6\]]mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]rgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems 
[\[130b.7\]]can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[131a.2\]]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[131a.3\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de 
[\[131a.4\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_
[\[131a.5\]]mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_
[\[131a.6\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs 
[\[131a.7\]]kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la bkod kyang /_sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[131b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas 
[\[131b.3\]]shing /_sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la 
[\[131b.4\]]rdo dang /_dbyig pas rdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o zhes go cha bgo ba byed cing /_sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god pa byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di 
[\[131b.5\]]lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[131b.6\]]sbyor ba dang /_rab tu 'god par byas na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag pa yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[131b.7\]]ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /_sems can gang yang bzod 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go 
[\[132a.2\]]cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 
[\[132a.3\]]'god do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe 
[\[132a.4\]]na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/_/rab 'byor 'di 
[\[132a.5\]]lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/_lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod 
[\[132a.6\]]na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[132a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang /_sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang 
[\[132b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[132b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang /_gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[132b.4\]]chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing /_chos gang la yang 'khrug pa'am/_'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/_de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi 
[\[132b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god par byas te/_de ltar yang dag par skul ba rnams kyang /_nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[132b.6\]]tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs 
[\[132b.7\]]shig mngon par sprul te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/_/
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod 
[\[133a.2\]]kyang /_sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[133a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag 
[\[133a.4\]]par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang /_
[\[133a.5\]]gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang yang skye ba 'am/_'gag pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_rnam par byang ba 'am/_tshu rol 
[\[133a.6\]]tam/_pha rol tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/_de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul 
[\[133a.7\]]zhing gzhog go 'god do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/_skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]sprul te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te bzhag cing bkod na/_rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/_gsol pa 
[\[133b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang /_sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha 
[\[133b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes 
[\[133b.4\]]bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[133b.5\]]khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/_/ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/_

[\[138a\]]

[\[138a.4\]]gzhog go 'god do/_/'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/_sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral

[\[138b.1\]]zhing gzhog go 'god do/_/ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/_sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/_/ji

[\[142a.3\]{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la dgod par bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/dbang po lnga la dgod par bya'o/_/stobs lnga la dgod par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[142a.4\]]bdun la dgod par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[142a.5\]]'jug pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par bya'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la dgod par bya'o/_/
[\[142a.6\]]mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par bya'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/so so yang dag 
[\[142a.7\]]par rig pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po la dgod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/_/rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dgod par bya'o snyam du sems skyed par gyur na/_rab 'byor 
[\[142b.2\]]de la ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/_sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/_sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_yang dag par spong 
[\[142b.3\]]ba bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_dbang po lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_stobs lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_'phags 
[\[142b.4\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[142b.5\]]par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[142b.6\]]dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[142b.7\]]pa'i stobs bcu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_snying rje chen po la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod 
[\[143a.2\]]dam/_dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_rang byang chub la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 
[\[143a.3\]]'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par sems bskyed/_stong pa nyid [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la dgod par 
[\[143a.4\]]sems bskyed/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_dbang po lnga la dgod par sems bskyed/_stobs lnga la dgod par 
[\[143a.5\]]sems bskyed/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par sems bskyed/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par sems bskyed/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_
[\[143a.6\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par sems 
[\[143a.7\]]bskyed/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la dgod par sems bskyed/_mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par sems bskyed/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par sems bskyed/_gzungs kyi sgo thams 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]cad la dgod par sems bskyed/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par sems bskyed/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/_snying rje chen po la dgod par sems bskyed/_sangs 
[\[143b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed/_dgra 
[\[143b.3\]]bcom pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed/_rang byang chub la dgod par sems bskyed/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed kyang sems can gang gi don du yang sems bskyed pa 
[\[143b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa 
[\[143b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[143b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo /_/'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo /_/'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}{]myig [,]mig [}]gis stong ngo /_/rna ba rna bas 
[\[143b.7\]]stong ngo /_/sna snas stong ngo /_/lce lces stong ngo /_/lus lus kyis stong ngo /_/yid yid kyis stong ngo /_/gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/sgra sgras stong ngo /_/dri dris stong ngo /_/ro ros stong ngo /_/reg reg gis stong ngo /_/chos chos kyis stong ngo /_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]

[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ngo /_/reg pa reg pas stong ngo /_/tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo /_/sred pa sred pas stong ngo /_/len pa len pas stong ngo /_/srid pa srid pas stong ngo /_/skye ba skye bas stong ngo /_/rga shi rga shis stong ngo /_/

[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/yang dag par

[\[145b.1\]]rje chen pos stong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ngo /_/go cha chen po yang go cha chen pos stong ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang

[\[150a.1\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed mngon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de shin tu [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed mngon par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_

[\[150a.5\]]bgos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/

[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[150b.2\]]'byor de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs gang yin/_de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshor ba gang yin/_de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'du shes gang yin/_de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'du byed gang yin/_de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam par shes pa

[\[151a.1\]]bu'i 'du byed de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gang 'di [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yor lta bu'i rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gang 'di gzugs brnyan lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gang 'di gzugs brnyan lta bu'i tshor ba de

[\[151a.5\]]ba'o/_/gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i 'du byed de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'das pa'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol

[\[151a.7\]]'ongs pa'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol 
[\[151b.2\]]ba'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir tshor ba ma 
[\[151b.3\]]bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gzugs dben pa'i phyir gzugs ma 
[\[151b.4\]]bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba dben pa'i phyir tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du shes dben pa'i phyir 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du byed dben pa'i phyir 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir rnam par 
[\[151b.5\]]shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba ma skyes pa'i phyir tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du shes ma skyes pa'i phyir 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du byed ma skyes pa'i phyir

[\[151b.7\]]ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/dge ba'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/dge ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dge ba'i 'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings 
[\[152a.2\]]ma grol ba'o/_/lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/lung du ma bstan pa'i 'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/lung du ma bstan pa'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol 
[\[152a.3\]]ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'jig rten pa'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'jig rten pa'i 'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'jig rten pa'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'jig rten 
[\[152a.4\]]pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'du shes ni ma bcings ma 
[\[152a.5\]]grol ba'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol 
[\[152a.6\]]ba'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma 
[\[152a.7\]]grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshor ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du shes ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'du byed ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir 'du shes ma bcings ma 
[\[152b.2\]]grol ba'o/_/'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gzugs dben pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba dben pa'i phyir tshor ba ma bcings 
[\[152b.3\]]ma grol ba'o/_/'du shes dben pa'i phyir 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du byed dben pa'i phyir 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs 
[\[152b.4\]]ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshor ba ma skyes pa'i phyir tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du shes ma skyes pa'i phyir 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/'du byed ma skyes pa'i phyir 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir rnam 
[\[152b.5\]]par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/[ {]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba ste/_tshe dang

[\[157a\]]

[\[157a.4\]]ba'o/_/ma skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/[{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/dben pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/ma skyes pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid

[\[160b\]]

[\[160b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]phyin pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la

[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]phyin pa ste/_de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_

[\[161b.7\]]bya'o/_/de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_phyi'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_gzugs dang sgra dang /_dri dang ro dang /_reg dang chos rnams te/_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i phyir/_gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i phyir/_sgra sgras stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i phyir/_dri dris stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i phyir/_ro

[\[162a.7\]]phyogs mtshams rnams phyogs mtshams rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]'jig pa'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa de yang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams

[\[163a.1\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_'di ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste/_chos thams

[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]bya'o/_/de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_gzugs ni 'jig pa'i 
[\[163b.2\]]mtshan nyid/_tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/_'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid/_'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid/_phung po ni sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid/_khams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid/_

[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]nyid/_btang snyoms chen po ni 'dre ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtshan nyid/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i phyir/_
[\[164a.2\]]'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis chos de dag thams cad stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag gi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_'di ni rang gi mtshan 
[\[164a.3\]]nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/de la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_gang la 'das pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i gnas [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas stong

[\[164a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jig pa'i phyir/_'dus pa 'dus pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/_'di ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo /_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni dngos po

[\[164a.7\]]pos stong ngo /_/ji ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas stong zhe na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te/_'dus ma byas de yang 'dus ma byas kyis stong bas/_de ltar na dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas stong ngo /_/ji ltar na rang bzhin 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]rang bzhin gyis stong zhe na/_rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste/_de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas/_mthong bas ma byas te/_'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[164b.2\]]pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[164b.3\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/_de ltar chos de dag gi gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni/_gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//_//
[\[164b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin 
[\[164b.5\]]chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya 
[\[164b.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[164b.7\]]'dzin dang /_rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'khrul ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa zhes bya 
[\[165a.2\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i tshig la gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar 'jug bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[165a.3\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par 
[\[165a.4\]]'du brgya mtsho'o phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes 
[\[165a.5\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par bsgyings ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam 
[\[165a.6\]]bar rkyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chags pa dang thogs pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshol ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[165a.7\]]ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas la rten pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bdud bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od mtha' 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[165b.2\]]glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad pa dang zal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[165b.3\]]rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'jig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab 
[\[165b.4\]]sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba gsal bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[165b.5\]]'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos dam pa'i 
[\[165b.6\]]phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su 
[\[165b.7\]]rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yi ge mnyam par bgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gcod pa zhes bya 
[\[166a.2\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[166a.3\]]'dzin dang /_gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yul las rgal bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[166a.4\]]dang /_yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems [{]myed [,]med [}]par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[166a.5\]]byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes 
[\[166a.6\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas su bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[166a.7\]]rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa 'dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin [{]cen [,]chen [}]snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi 'od gzer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[166b.2\]]'dzin dang /_spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya 
[\[166b.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[166b.4\]]rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i 
[\[166b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[166b.6\]]mthun pa dang 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[166b.7\]]'dzin dang /_rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul 
[\[167a\]]
