[\[167a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[167a.2\]]yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snod las rang 'byung ba zhes 
[\[167a.3\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes chen po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgo rnam par 
[\[167a.4\]]'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel 
[\[167a.5\]]ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' ltar chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas 
[\[167a.6\]]rnam par grol zhing gos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul la spyod pa ste/_'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[167a.7\]]nge 'dzin to/_/de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa lta bur 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba ste/_'di ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed 
[\[167b.2\]]pa ste/_'di ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/
[\[167b.3\]]de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos 
[\[167b.4\]]thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[167b.5\]]'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba ste/_'di ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas 
[\[167b.6\]]shing /_chos kyi dbyings su rtogs par 'gro ba ste/_'di ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal 
[\[167b.7\]]mtshan nges par 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[168a.2\]]to/_/de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa ste/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_de la 
[\[168a.3\]]rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing bsod nams kyi tshogs kun 'dzin cing chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar byed pa ste/_'di ni rab tu bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'dzugs pa 
[\[168a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po thams cad bde bar 'jog cing 'dzugs pa ste/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'dzugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[168a.5\]]'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/_'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'khrul pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing snyoms par 'jug pa thams 
[\[168a.6\]]cad kyi spyod yul dang /_spyod pa thams cad rjes su dran zhing nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa ste/_'di ni 'khrul pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas 
[\[168a.7\]]shing ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od gzer gyis sems can gyi khams snang bar byed cing /_sngon gyi spyod pa rjes su dran par byed pa ste/_'di ni 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brtson pa'i mthu skyed par byed pa ste/_'di ni brtson pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting 
[\[168b.2\]]nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par dgod pa ste/_'di ni dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'phags 
[\[168b.3\]]par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug 
[\[168b.4\]]pa ste/_'di ni nges pa'i tshig la gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la 'jug pa ste/_'di 
[\[168b.5\]]ni tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/_'di ni phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya 
[\[168b.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyam 
[\[168b.7\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba ste/_'di ni nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dong ba ste/_'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rgyal po'i 
[\[169a.2\]]phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_don thams cad nges par sgrub pa la ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgyas 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa lta bu ste/_'di ni rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nam mkha' 
[\[169a.3\]]rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/_'di ni nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[169a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang 
[\[169a.5\]]zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin pa ste/_'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_de la rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i 
[\[169a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ji ltar rgyal mtshan dam pa bzhin ting nge 'dzin thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa ste/_'di ni rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[169a.7\]]nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dbang dam pa nges par thob pa ste/_'di ni dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rjes su phyin ci ma log par yang dag par zhugs pa ste/_'di ni rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_rdul dang dri ma thams cad 
[\[169b.2\]]rab tu spangs pa'i dbang du gyur cing /_ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du dbang dam pa thob pas bsgyings pa lta bu ste/_'di ni seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la seng ge rnam par rkyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de 
[\[169b.3\]]la gnas shing cho 'phrul dam pa'i dbang thob pas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_bdud thams cad kyi dpung 'jig cing 'dzul bar byed pa ste/_'di ni seng ge rnam par rkyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[169b.4\]]'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing spobs pa dam pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par/_mu stegs can log par lta ba thams cad 'dul ba ste/_'di ni seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snrel zhi 
[\[169b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_'khor ba'i chos rnams rgyun nges par gcod par byed pa ste/_'di ni snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chags pa dang thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 
[\[169b.6\]]'dzin de la gnas shing chos thams cad la 'dzin pa dang thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni chags pa dang thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_nyon mongs 
[\[169b.7\]]pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/_'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la tshol ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos gang yang tshol ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni tshol ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gnas la rten pa 
[\[170a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos gang yang gnas la rten par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni gnas la rten pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[170a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_sems kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung sems las byung ba rnams kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgyu ba ste/_'di ni sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la bdud bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing bdud bzhi'i 
[\[170a.4\]]dgra thams cad 'dul bar byed pa ste/_'di ni bdud bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa ste/_
[\[170a.5\]]'di ni dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/_'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od 
[\[170a.6\]]byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/_'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu 
[\[170a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/_'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa ste/_
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]'di ni dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste/_'di ni 'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya 
[\[170b.2\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[170b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/_'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad shes pa dang /_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa yang dag 
[\[170b.4\]]par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rab tu thob pa ste/_'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'pham pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[170b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zad pa 
[\[170b.6\]]dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes par rjes su mthong nas/_rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba de ltar mthong ba ste/_'di ni zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[170b.7\]]'dzin to/_/de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gul rab tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed/_rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa ste/_'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing mnyam par gzhag pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'jig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[171a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni 'jig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/_
[\[171a.3\]]'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa ste/_'di ni zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la shes rab sgron 
[\[171a.4\]]ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ste/_'di ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[171a.5\]]gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]lnga yongs su dag par byed pa ste/_'di ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[171a.6\]]cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba dang /_
[\[171a.7\]]zla ba bzhin du gyur pa ste/_'di ni zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/_'di ni snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/_'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[171b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[171b.3\]]thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa ste/_'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na/_sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo rnam 
[\[171b.4\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog_/yongs su yi 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_nyams su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_de la sems zhes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba ste/_'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la kun tu snang ba zhes 
[\[171b.5\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas 
[\[171b.6\]]shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas 
[\[171b.7\]]snang ba ste/_'di ni rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mthas/_phyag rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung bas phyag 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[172a.2\]]yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong ba ste/_'di ni 
[\[172a.3\]]dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni 
[\[172a.4\]]chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'phags shing yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_'di ni chos kyis 
[\[172a.5\]]'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing yon tan rin po ce chen po mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi 'byung khung du gyur pa ste/_'di ni rin po ce nyid ces bya ba'i 
[\[172a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing 'jig rten gyi rtsod pa dang 'khrug pa rnam pa sna tshogs spong ba ste/_'di ni 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya 
[\[172a.7\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/_'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos rnams kyi mnyam pa 
[\[172b.2\]]nyid nges par 'tho pa ste/_'di ni rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing spyod pa mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa skyed pa ste/_'di ni dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[172b.3\]]'dzin to/_/de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yi ge dang bral ba 
[\[172b.4\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[172b.5\]]de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa/_'chad par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad 'gyur ba 
[\[172b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste/_'di ni 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[172b.7\]]'dzin to/_de la [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par byed pa ste/_'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_bya ba thams cad kun spong pa ste/_'di ni bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nges pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[173a.2\]]'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni yang dag par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]cing tha snyad la ltos pa tsam mo zhes rtog pa 'jug pa ste/_'di ni nges pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyod pa 
[\[173a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[173a.4\]]de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba ste/_'di ni rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang 
[\[173a.5\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 
[\[173a.6\]]ste/_'di ni g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/_'di ni yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[173a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/_'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sems [{]myed [,]med [}]par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa ste/_'di ni sems [{]myed [,]med [}]par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de 
[\[173b.2\]]la nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin de dag la sems nges par gnas kyang /_de'i mtshan nyid [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]par rtogs pa ste/_'di ni nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 
[\[173b.3\]]dge ba'i [{]mye [,]me [}]tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[173b.4\]]'dzin to/_/de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/
[\[173b.5\]]de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la mtha' yas 
[\[173b.6\]]sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ji ltar sgron ma gsal bas chos thams cad rab tu snang bar byed pa lta bu ste/_'di ni mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[173b.7\]]gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/_'di ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe 
[\[174a.2\]]na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud mthong ba ste/_'di ni yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[174a.3\]]gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gnas su bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[174a.4\]]gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni gnas su bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[174a.5\]]chos gang yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad dang /_ting 
[\[174a.6\]]nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[174a.7\]]thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam par 'dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la spyod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing snyoms par 'jug pa de dag las spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston kyang gang la yang 
[\[174b.2\]]'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni spyod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/_
[\[174b.3\]]de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du [{]myi [,]mi [}]chud pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 
[\[174b.4\]]brda dang sgra la 'jug pa ste/_'di ni brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing 'gyur ba dang 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing yon tan dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa'i rin po ce rgyu dam pa sgrub pa ste/_'di ni 
[\[174b.5\]]rin [{]cen [,]chen [}]snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos gang la yang chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni chos thams 
[\[174b.6\]]cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la log gi 'od gzer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyed pas mun pa mun gnag sel ba dang /_gzhan yang yon tan mtha' 
[\[174b.7\]]yas pa brgya 'god pa ste/_'di ni glog gi 'od gzer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mtha' yas pa spong ba ste/_'di ni spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]'dzin to/_/de la chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid snang bar byed pa ste/_'di ni chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ye shes sgron 
[\[175a.2\]]ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos rnams kyi chos dang /_gang zag la bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gsal bar ston pa ste/_'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[175a.3\]]'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa gzhan gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thub pa dam pa sgrub pa ste/_'di ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral 
[\[175a.4\]]ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad yi ge dang bral bar rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang 
[\[175a.5\]]zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid kyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/_'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de 
[\[175a.6\]]la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la mngon par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[175a.7\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni mngon par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad la ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa ste/_'di ni ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[175b.2\]]cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya kun 'dzin 
[\[175b.3\]]pa ste/_'di ni gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang 
[\[175b.4\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad par rung 
[\[175b.5\]]bar yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_gzungs thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros 
[\[175b.6\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag pa dang /_log par yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni yang dag pa 
[\[175b.7\]]dang /_log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la mthun pa dang 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[176a.2\]]thams cad la mthun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni mthun pa dang 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 
[\[176a.3\]]'khor [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste 'di ni 'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni snying po dang ldan pa 
[\[176a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'di lta ste/_dper na/_zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni zla ba 
[\[176a.5\]]dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris snang bar byas shing mun pa mun nag dang tsha ba'i gdung ba sel bar byed pa 
[\[176a.6\]]ste/_'di ni glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de 
[\[176a.7\]]la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'jig rten thams 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skyob pa ste/_'di ni 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting 
[\[176b.2\]]nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]rtse gcig kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[176b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/_'di ni rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag 
[\[176b.4\]]par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams 
[\[176b.5\]]cad nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 
[\[176b.6\]]thams cad nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gnas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[176b.7\]]ste/_'di ni gnas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /_sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]pa ste/_'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /_sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_mnyam par gzhag pa'i mthus yon tan mang po skyed de ji 
[\[177a.2\]]ltar lha dag bsod nams kyi mthus kha zas dag snod las rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta bu ste/_'di ni snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[177a.3\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi thab ma lus par sreg pa ste/_'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ye shes chen po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ye shes kyi 'od kyis thams cad snang 
[\[177a.4\]]bar byed pa ste/_'di ni ye shes chen po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 
[\[177a.5\]]ste/_'di ni stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi don du dam pa'i chos kyi sgo phye bas/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[177a.6\]]chen po las myur du sgrol ba ste/_'di ni sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste/_'di ni 
[\[177a.7\]]lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste/_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste/_'di ni ngag gi skyon 
[\[177b.2\]]yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yid kyi las [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste/_'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[177b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i bye brag la kun tu rtog cing grol bar byed pa ste/_'di ni kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nam mkha' lta bu'i 
[\[177b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin sems can rnams la snyoms par phan 'dogs pa ste/_'di ni nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa 
[\[177b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'thob pa ste/_'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[177b.6\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u brgyad do//_//
[\[177b.7\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes 
[\[178a.2\]]bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /_rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go/_/phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_
[\[178a.3\]]brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /_rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go/_/phyi nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus 
[\[178a.4\]]kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /_rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go/_/nang gi tshor 
[\[178a.5\]]ba la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /_rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa 
[\[178a.6\]]rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go/_/phyi'i tshor ba la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod 
[\[178a.7\]]kyang /_tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go/_/phyi nang gi tshor ba la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /_tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nang gi sems la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig 
[\[178b.2\]]rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /_rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/phyi'i sems la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang 
[\[178b.3\]]ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/phyi nang gi sems la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes 
[\[178b.4\]]su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /_rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nang gi chos la de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[178b.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /_chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam 
[\[178b.6\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go/_/phyi'i chos la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /_rnam par spyod kyang chos dang 
[\[178b.7\]]ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/phyi nang gi chos la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /_chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/_rab 
[\[179a.2\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gron 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de'i lus nyams bde ba'am 
[\[179a.3\]]nyams [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde yang rung ste/_ji lta ji ltar gnas pa/_de lta de ltar des rab tu shes te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa 
[\[179a.4\]]dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod de/_de 'gro'am 
[\[179a.5\]]'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_lta'am rnam par lta yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_bskum ma ma brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang /_myangs 
[\[179a.6\]]pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_nyal ba dang gnyid kyis mya myo bstsal ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_'gro ba dang 'ong ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_'greng ba dang 'dug pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_gnyid kyis log gam ma log na yang 
[\[179a.7\]]shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_smra ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]smra na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]tshe/_nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[179b.2\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na yang /_dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na yang /_dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs nang du ring du rgyun yang 
[\[179b.3\]]dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na yang /_dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu na yang /_dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na yang /_phyir 
[\[179b.4\]]dbugs thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_'khor ba'i 'khor lo skor ba'am/_'khor ba'i 'khor lo skor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni/_ring du skor na ring du skor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/thung ngu skor na thung ngu skor ro zhes 
[\[179b.5\]]bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran par dbugs nang du rgyus na yang /_dran par dbugs nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dran par dbugs 
[\[179b.6\]]phyir rgyus na yang dran par dbugs phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs ring du nang du rgyus na yang /_dbugs ring du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs ring du phyir rgyus na yang /_dbugs ring du phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu 
[\[179b.7\]]shes so/_/dbugs thung ngu nang du rgyus na yang /_dbugs thung ngu nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs thung ngu phyir rgyus na yang /_dbugs thung ngu phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde 
[\[180a.2\]]ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/_/chu'i khams dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes 
[\[180a.3\]]bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_ba lang gi shen pa'am/_ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po thogs te/_ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te/_de ltar so sor phye nas/_
[\[180a.4\]]'greng ngam 'dug ste/_de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang /_lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/_/chu'i khams dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang yod do 
[\[180a.5\]]zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_'greng ngam 'dug ste/_nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus 
[\[180a.6\]]kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab 
[\[180a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/_skra dang [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]man chad du/_sen mo dang /_spu dang pags pa yan chad du [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/_lus 'di la skra dang /_spu dang 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]sen mo dang /_bags pa dang /_glog pa dang /_sha dang chub dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_snying dang mkhal ma dang mchin pa dang /_glo ba dang /_mtsher pa dang /_long ka dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_nang grol dang /_gcin dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchi ma dang /_
[\[180b.2\]]rngul dang /_tshil dang /_snabs dang /_ngar snabs dang /_rnag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_chu ser dang /_kha chu dang /_dri ma dang /[ {]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]dang /_glad rgyas dang /_rngu ma dang /_rna spabs dag kyang yod do/_/zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/_rab 
[\[180b.3\]]'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chun pa'i sgye snod til dang /_yungs kar dang /_sran chung dang /_bal sran dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_'bras dang /_'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]zhig gis phye ste/_bltas na/_'di ni til lo/_/'di ni yungs kar ro/_/
[\[180b.4\]]'di ni sran chung ngo /_/'di ni bal sran no/_/'di ni nas so/_/'di ni gro'o/_/'di ni 'bras so/_/'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil 
[\[180b.5\]]yan chad/_skra dang spyi bo man chad sen mo dang /_spu dang /_pags pa yan chad du [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/_lus 'di la skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_pags pa dang /_glog pa dang /_sha dang /_chu ba dang /_khrag dang /_rus 
[\[180b.6\]]pa dang /_rkang dang /_snying dang /_mkhal ma dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba dang /_mtsher pa dang /_long ka dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_nang grol dang /_gcin dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchi ma dang /_rngul dang /_tshil dang /_snabs dang /_ngar snabs dang /_rnag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_
[\[180b.7\]]bad kan dang /_chu ser dang /_kha chu dang /_dri ma dang /[ {]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]dang /_glad rgyas dang /_rngu ma dang /_rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go/_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan 
[\[181a.2\]]pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs/_
[\[181a.3\]]dur khrod du bor ba/_ro'i mal du bsnyal ba/_shi nas zhag gcig lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am/_rnam par bam pa'am/_rnam par sngos pa'am/_rnam par 
[\[181a.4\]]rnags pa'am/_rnam par zos pa'am/_rnam par 'thor ba mthong na/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can no/_/'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o/_/zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de 
[\[181a.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems 
[\[181a.6\]]dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro/_shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag bdun lon 
[\[181a.7\]]pa/_bya rog gam/_khwa'am/_'ol pa'am/_bya rgod dam/_spyang ki'am/_wa'am khyi'am/_de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di nyid kyang de lta bu'i chos can/_
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]de lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_chos nyid de lta bu las ma 'das so/_/zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_
[\[181b.2\]]brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[181b.3\]]nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtsang ba rnags pa/_sungs pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di yang /_'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye 
[\[181b.4\]]bar rtog go/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_
[\[181b.5\]]'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa/_keng rus shar ri dang /_khrag ra ri 
[\[181b.6\]]chags pa/_rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel ba mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o/_/zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/_/rab 'byor de 
[\[181b.7\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus sha dang khrag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rgyus pa'i 
[\[182a.2\]]gzungs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/_lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/_/rab 
[\[182a.3\]]'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig 
[\[182a.4\]]rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus gzungs 
[\[182a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa gyes pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa/_sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das 
[\[182a.6\]]pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin 
[\[182a.7\]]dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]khrod kyi rus pas la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba/_rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_tshigs pa'i 
[\[182b.2\]]rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_mjing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_mgo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor ba mthong na/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos 
[\[182b.3\]]can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[182b.4\]]lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes 
[\[182b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/_rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa/_dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyang de dang nye bar sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta 
[\[182b.6\]]bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus 
[\[182b.7\]]kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma khon pa rab rib snang ba/_sngon por gyur pa thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/_zegs pa brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'gran [(]'gren [,]'gran [)]du gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang 
[\[183a.2\]]de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can no/_/'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[183a.3\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/phyi'i lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[183a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/phyi nang gi lus la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lus 
[\[183a.5\]]kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/nang gi tshor ba la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /_
[\[183a.6\]]brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/phyi'i tshor ba la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can 
[\[183a.7\]]shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/phyi nang gi tshor ba la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/nang gi sems la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig

[\[183b.3\]]yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/phyi nang gi sems la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par 
[\[183b.4\]]bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/nang gi chos la de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/

[\[183b.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[183b.7\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sdig to [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa'i rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]bskyed pa'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis mos bskyed cing rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems kyi mthu skyed do/_/yang

[\[184a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[184a.6\]]dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su 
[\[184a.7\]]grub pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/_/sems kyi ting 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/_/dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul

[\[184b.3\]]po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes

[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]lag go/_/de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas

[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa

[\[185b.6\]]brgyad pa ste/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag

[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/_/de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/_/yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

[\[186b.5\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad 
[\[186b.6\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/_sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/de la mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par rtog pa'i tshe/_sems 
[\[186b.7\]]gnas pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_'di ni mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/de la smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/zhes mngon par 'du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa'i tshe/_sems gnas pa 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_'di ni smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo de dag la zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par dran par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[187a.2\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar ye shes bcu gcig ste/_bcu gcig gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa 
[\[187a.3\]]dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_'dris pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/_/de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[188a.1\]]skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /_rga shi [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o/_/de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/_sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o/_/de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/_gang

[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan

[\[191a.1\]]btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs
