[\[191a.5\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma yod do zhes [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[191a.6\]]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing 
[\[191a.7\]]gnas te/_de dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[191b.2\]]shes so/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las dang /_las yongs su len pa'i rnam par smyin pa/_gnas kyi rnam pa dang /_rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten ni khams sna tshogs can te/_'jig 
[\[191b.3\]]rten ni khams du ma pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sems can gzhan dang /_gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang /_mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sems can gzhan dang gang zag 
[\[191b.4\]]gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang /_tham shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[191b.5\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/_tshe 
[\[191b.6\]]rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_tshe rabs brgya dang /_tshe rabs stong dang /_tshe rabs brgya stong dang /_tshe rabs bye ba dang /_tshe rabs bye ba brgya dang /_tshe rabs bye ba stong dang /_tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /_tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[191b.7\]]phrag stong dag kyang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag stong nas/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag kyang rjes su dran te/_bdag ni 'di lta 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/rus ni 'di zhes bya'o/_/zas ni 'di za za'o/_/yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so/_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/_de ltar bdag 
[\[192a.2\]]de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar rnam pa dang bcas/_sa mal dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/_/lha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[192a.3\]]rnam par dag pa [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]las 'das pas/_sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang /_ngan song na 'khod pa dang /_las ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[192a.4\]]nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/_log par lta bdag ste/_de'i rgyu de'i 
[\[192a.5\]]rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags 
[\[192a.6\]]pa la skur pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]'debs pa/_yang dag par lta ba dag ste/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam 
[\[192a.7\]]par grol ba zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon du byas te/_nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod do/_/bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_rab 'byor de yang de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[192b.2\]]'jigs pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/_de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_
[\[192b.3\]]tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang /_yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa 
[\[192b.4\]]dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha 'am bdud dam/_tshangs pa 
[\[192b.5\]]'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa/_bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/_de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to/_/zhes bya bar ba dag la dge sbyong 
[\[192b.6\]]ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la 
[\[192b.7\]]bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la 
[\[193a.2\]]bsten na/_bar chad kyi chos su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i rgyu 
[\[193a.3\]]yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor kyi 
[\[193a.4\]]nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/gang 
[\[193a.5\]]yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/_sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta 
[\[193a.6\]]bu'i gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste 
[\[193a.7\]]rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa thob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[193b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_don so so yang dag 
[\[193b.3\]]par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa 
[\[193b.4\]]chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad de/[ {]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_gang gis nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[193b.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang /_gang gis nam la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa sdug 
[\[193b.6\]]bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/ca co [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/dgongs pa 
[\[193b.7\]]nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/'du shes sna tshogs [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_mos pa yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/shes rab yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/rnam par 
[\[194a.2\]]grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga'o/_/sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/thugs kyi 
[\[194a.3\]]phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/da ltar 
[\[194a.4\]]byung ba'i dus lam thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[194a.5\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang /_brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_yi ge'i sgo dang /_yi ge la 'jug pa ste/_de la yi ge'i sgo dang /_yi ge la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes 
[\[194a.6\]]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa ston pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams 
[\[194a.7\]]cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/na zhes bya ba ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang bral zhing [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i 'khri shing dang /_rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Ta zhes bya ba ni 
[\[194b.2\]]dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_'ching bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir 
[\[194b.3\]]chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[194b.4\]]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas mnyam pa nyid las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ma zhes bya ba 
[\[194b.5\]]ni bdag gir bya ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tha zhes bya ba ni gnas [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[194b.6\]]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su 
[\[194b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sta zhes bya ba ni bstod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dz+nya zhes bya ba ni ye shes [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/rta zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[195a.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad 
[\[195a.3\]]kyi sgo'o/_/hwa zhes bya ba ni bod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tas zhes bya ba ni mos pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tha zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa 
[\[195a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas gang yang 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'dug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]la nyal bar 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/pha zhes bya 
[\[195a.5\]]ba ni 'bras bu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ska zhes bya ba ni phung po [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/yas zhes bya ba ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[195a.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/D+ha zhes bya ba ni g.yog pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas mtha' thug par gnas par 'chi 'pho [{]myed [,]med [}]cing skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir chos thams 
[\[195a.7\]]cad kyi sgo ste/_de yan chad yi ge'i tha snyad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang /_gang gis brjod pa dang /_gang gis bstan pa dang /_gang bri ba dang /_gang snang ba dang /_gang klag par bya ba de 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]lta bu'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa a las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[195b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po gang gis a las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su shes na/_de ni sgra gang la yang chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_thams cad chos nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur zhing sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[195b.3\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis a las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya 'di dang /_a las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/_thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[195b.4\]]kun chub par byed cing gzhan la yang tshul dang ldan pa'i blos ston na/_de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa dang ldan/_blo gros dang ldan/_rtogs pa dang ldan/_blo dang ldan/_dga' ba dang ldan/_
[\[195b.5\]]ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/_spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par thob cing the tsom [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur la/_gzhan las ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang 
[\[195b.6\]]khong khro bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bas/_mtho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing dma' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_skye mched la mkhas 
[\[195b.7\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/_rgyu la mkhas shing rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po rab dang tha ma 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_lha'i rna ba'i shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur 
[\[196a.2\]]ba dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_zag pa zad pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa 
[\[196a.3\]]bstan pa shes par bya ba'i mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa la mkhas pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 
[\[196a.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo a las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa 'di yang de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u 
[\[196a.5\]]dgu'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang 
[\[196a.6\]]dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sa nas sar 'phar te/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu 
[\[196a.7\]]phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad 'pho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_chos gang yang 'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_'pho ba'am nye bar 'pho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'on kyang chos thams cad kyis 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]gang yin pa de la rlom sems su byed pa'am/_sems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de sa yongs su sbyong ba yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa ma yin la/_sa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_
[\[196b.2\]]rab 'byor sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su sbyong ba bcu po 'di dag bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[196b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhing sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sbyin pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_len pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_
[\[196b.4\]]des rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_khyim [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_mtshan 
[\[196b.5\]]dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi sku la mas pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos kyi rnam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos kyi yang dag pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[196b.6\]]nga rgyal dang khengs pa bstsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_tshig [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/_rab 'byor yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas bya ba dag 
[\[196b.7\]]go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang du yid la bya ste/_de la nan tan du bya'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]dang /_byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba dang /_bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang /_rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba dang /_snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang /_bla ma bsnyen bkur 
[\[197a.2\]]zhing dad pas gus par bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba ste/_rab 'byor chos brgyad po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas/_yang dang yang du yid la bya zhing /_de dag la nan tan 
[\[197a.3\]]du bya ba dag go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mang du thos pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms shing de la yang yi ge la mngon par ma zhen pa dang /_zang 
[\[197a.4\]]zing [{]myed [,]med [}]par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing des kyang rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing /_yongs su sngo yang des rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[197a.5\]]'khor bas yongs su skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing /_des kyang rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas kyang de rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba ste/_rab 'byor chos lnga po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[197a.6\]]sa gsum pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba dag go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/_chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su blangs shing gnas par bya ste/_de dag yongs su gtang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[197a.7\]]bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgon pa la gnas pa dang /_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba dang /_bslab pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang /_mya ngan 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /_sems zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dngos po thams cad la ltos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 
[\[197b.2\]]bzhi pa la gnas pas yongs su gtang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dag go/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ste/_drug 
[\[197b.3\]]gang zhe na/_'di ltar khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_dge slong ma dang bsten pa dang /_rigs la ser sna byed pa dang /_'du 'dzi'i gnas dang /_gnod sems dang /_bdag stod cing gzhan smod pa ste/_chos drug po de dag ni yongs 
[\[197b.4\]]su spang bar bya'o/_/yang chos [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su spang bar bya ste/_'di ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_khengs pa dang /_phyin ci log rnams dang /_the tsom dang /_'dod chags dang 
[\[197b.5\]]zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba ste/_chos [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 
[\[197b.6\]]drug pa la gnas pas chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ste/_chos drug gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems 
[\[197b.7\]]yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/slongs mo ba mthong na zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bya ste/_zhum pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ste/_
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/slongs mo ba mthong na slongs mo bas 'khrug par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ste/_'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor chos drug po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[198a.2\]]chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ste/_nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag tu 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/sems 
[\[198a.3\]]can du 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/srog tu 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/gang zag tu 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/chad par 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/rtag par 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/mtshan ma'i 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/rgyur lta ba dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la mngon par 
[\[198a.4\]]chags pa dang /_phung po la mngon par chags pa dang /_khams la mngon par chags pa dang /_skye mched la mngon par chags pa dang /_khams gsum la mngon par chags pa dang /_khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang /_khams gsum la rten pa dang /_khams gsum la 
[\[198a.5\]]gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_chos la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_dge 'dun la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_tshul khrims la rten pa'i 
[\[198a.6\]]lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/_rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/des chos nyi shu po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_nyi shu gang 
[\[198a.7\]]zhe na/_stong pa nyid rdzogs par bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mngon du bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shes par bya ba dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba dang /_sems can de dag la brnyas 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs shing /_des rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba la bzod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba shes pa dang /_chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang /_rtog pa 
[\[198b.2\]]yang dag par bstsal ba dang /_'du shes dang /_lta ba rnam par bzlog pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong gi sa dang /_dul ba'i sems dang /_zhi ba'i sems dang /_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byams pa'i skabs shes pa dang /_gang du 'dod pa'i 
[\[198b.3\]]zhing du 'gro ba dang /_thams cad du bdag gi ngo bo ston pa ste/_rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[198b.4\]]chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud par bya ba dang /_mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta 
[\[198b.5\]]zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/_rab 'byor bzhi po de dag ni yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i chos so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[198b.6\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sgyu ma 
[\[198b.7\]]lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa ste/_rab 'byor 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]chos bzhi po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis 
[\[199a.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su gzung ba ste/_ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[199a.3\]]mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi'am [,]mi'am [}]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes pa dang /_ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rgyud phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[199a.4\]]dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 
[\[199a.5\]]phun sum tshogs pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bcu gnyis po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dgu pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/_/rab 'byor sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[199a.6\]]chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i 
[\[199a.7\]]bsam pa las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa yongs su sbyang ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]mang po yang dag par sdud pa 'di ni/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[199b.2\]]po gang sems can thams cad kyi don du theg pa chen po'i ye shes tshol zhing sgrub par byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam 
[\[199b.3\]]pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi ste/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems 
[\[199b.4\]]mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba 
[\[199b.5\]]yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par skul ba dang /_gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[199b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bsten pa dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang bla ma la phu dud du bya ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[199b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chos tshol zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'byung zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung 
[\[200a.2\]]yang de la bar chad byed pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_
[\[200a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur gyi bar du/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam yang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa 
[\[200a.4\]]yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[200a.5\]]pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston cing /_thog mar yang dge ba bar du yang dge ba tha mar yang dge ba/_yi ge bzang po/_don bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di 
[\[200a.6\]]lta ste/_mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa 
[\[200a.7\]]dang /_gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag yang dag par ston pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang /_khengs pa 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bstsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_nga rgyal dang /_khengs pa ji ltar bstsal ba des/_nam yang rigs dma' bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang /_khengs pa bstsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[200b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub 
[\[200b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[200b.4\]]byed cing /_de ma yin pa'i tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[200b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du chud mi gzon na/_mang po lta 
[\[200b.6\]]ci smos te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la gnod sems [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[200b.7\]]'tshe ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smyin par byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su 
[\[201a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba 
[\[201a.3\]]gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/_sems can 
[\[201a.4\]]thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du/_de dag du gtub cing gsheg pa dang /_brdung zhing btso ba dang /_bsreg pa las [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/_de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don tu spro zhing skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_
[\[201a.5\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed 
[\[201a.6\]]pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_las gzhan 
[\[201a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]par sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba'o/_/de la 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ji bstan pa de dag 
[\[201b.2\]]thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/zhes [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing [{]myed [,]med [}]par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 
[\[201b.3\]]'byed pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/_chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub du yang re ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/
[\[201b.4\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing yongs su sngo ba gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /_bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing 
[\[201b.5\]]yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing yongs su sngo ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[201b.6\]]po'i dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brten na/_sems can yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar rton cing /_
[\[201b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du nam yang skyo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[202a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[202a.3\]]gtang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la yang 'dod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[202a.4\]]'dod pa chung ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o/_/
[\[202a.5\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtog par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon 
[\[202a.6\]]tan gyi sdom pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang ba gang zhe na/_bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtang 
[\[202a.7\]]ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i 
[\[202b.2\]]sems bskyed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na/_phyi nang gi chos thams cad la 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su 
[\[202b.3\]]gtang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang zhe na/_rnam par shes pa gnas pa la de'i sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/de 
[\[202b.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang zhe na/_dngos po thams cad yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[202b.5\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang /_mgo bregs shing ngur smrig gi gos bgo ba ste/_
[\[202b.6\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_dge slong ma dang se go la gtogs pa 
[\[202b.7\]]tsam du yang lhan cig [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas shing /_de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed cing /_de'i rgyus gos 'thob par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_gang bdag gis sems can 
[\[203a.2\]]thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/_de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la 
[\[203a.3\]]ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/_
[\[203a.4\]]nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am/_de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/_de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya ste/_'di ni byang 
[\[203a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yan zhe na/_gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs 
[\[203a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed cing /_thab mo'i sems sam/_rtsod pa'i sems kyi go [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag 
[\[203a.7\]]stod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag stod pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyi rol kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[203b.2\]]sems dpa' chen pos [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod na/_'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dgos kyis 
[\[203b.3\]]spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe 
[\[203b.4\]]na/_de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]na gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes nga rgyal du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang 
[\[203b.5\]]bar bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni 
[\[203b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_dngos por [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[203b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yid gnyis spang bar bya zhe na/_gang gi phyir chos thams cad yid gnyis dang bral bar mthong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]po'i yid gnyis yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyam rangs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba yin zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug 
[\[204a.2\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyam rangs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'o/_/de la sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[204a.3\]]ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/_de ci'i 
[\[204a.4\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i gang chen mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/_/phyin to/_/phyin par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang 
[\[204a.5\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]brjod pa dang /_'dus ma byas te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[204a.6\]]dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/_nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi 
[\[204a.7\]]lam ma yin pas/_sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/_slongs mo pa mthong na sems zhum pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]bskyed do/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/_dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang bas yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/'di ltar de ni byang 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]chub kyi lam ma yin pas/_thog ma sems bskyed nas/_kha za yag gi sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'i sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[204b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/sems can du 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/srog tu 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di 
[\[204b.3\]]ltar srog shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag tu 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang zag shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin 
[\[204b.4\]]tu ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la rtag pa dang /_chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ji 
[\[204b.5\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 
[\[204b.6\]]'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des/_de'i dngos po yang dag par 
[\[204b.7\]]rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar phung po shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_de ltar na phung po la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_/khams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar khams rnams shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir te/_de ltar na khams la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de

[\[205b.1\]]pas/_sangs rgyas mthong bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten

[\[205b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_

[\[206a.1\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/_rang gi mtshan

[\[206a.3\]]thams cad yid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa shes pa yin zhe na/_de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

[\[206a.5\]]rdzogs pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sems can thams cad la brnyas par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bya zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/_/

[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la bzod pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba shes pa gang yin zhe na/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba shes pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba shes pa'o/_/de la byang

[\[206b.5\]]zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gang yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang yin zhe na/_khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/
[\[206b.6\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/_dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi

[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos bzhin du/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang yang dag par mthong la/_'di la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba gang yin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad du bdag gi ngo bo ston pa gang 
[\[207a.2\]]zhe na/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su gang dang gang la dga' ba de la ci ltar dga' ba rang gi ngo bo de dang de ston pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/_sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems 
[\[207a.3\]]las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang /_de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du 
[\[207a.4\]]shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang /_de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[207a.5\]]dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing /_des rlom sems su [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed 
[\[207a.6\]]pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/_
[\[207a.7\]]chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang /_tha ma shes pa gang zhe na/_stobs bcu la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i 
[\[207b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad byed kyang /_de'i sems chos gang la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jug pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par 
[\[207b.3\]]gzhag pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smyin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus 
[\[207b.4\]]yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin to/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[207b.5\]]chen po ched du bsams shing /_srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba 
[\[207b.6\]]yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/_ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[207b.7\]]chen pos/_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi'am [,]mi'am [}]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]du chud pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud 
[\[208a.2\]]pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[208a.3\]]dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[208a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/_bram ze'i rigs 
[\[208a.5\]]che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[208a.6\]]gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[208a.7\]]'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/_de dag rnam pa drug 
[\[208b.2\]]tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[208b.3\]]po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang /_lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun 
[\[208b.4\]]sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/_lhun baiDU rlar 
[\[208b.5\]]'dug pa yin/_yal ga rin po ce bdun gyi rang bzhin las grub pa yin/_me tog dang /_lo ma rin po ce thams cad las gyur pa yin/_shing de'i dri zhim po dang /_'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par gang ba yin te/_
[\[208b.6\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[208b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[209a.2\]]rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon 
[\[209a.3\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa ni de bzhin 
[\[209a.4\]]gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_
[\[209a.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_
[\[209a.6\]]nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[209a.7\]]la spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_thog ma dang tham [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[209b.2\]]nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /_stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[209b.3\]]lag rnams la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[209b.4\]]'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa dang /_mngon

[\[209b.6\]]pa dang /_snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/_rigs kyis las yang dag par 'da'/_brgya dpa'i sa las yang dag par 
[\[209b.7\]]'da'/_mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/_bsrabs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/_nyan thos kyis las yang dag par 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]'da'/_rang sangs rgyas kyis las yang dag par 'a da'/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ste/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/de ltar sa dgu las yongs su 'das 
[\[210a.2\]]nas/_sangs rgyas kyis la gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o//_//
[\[210a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bco lnga pa/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras ba ni/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum nas 'byung bar

[\[213b.2\]]gang mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams 'byug bar 'dod pa de ni/_lus kyi 'du te reg pa'i khyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum rnam 'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/stongs

[\[217b.4\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/yang dag par spong pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[217b.5\]]kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_/stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo 
[\[217b.6\]]nyid ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos 
[\[217b.7\]]rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_bsam gtan rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan

[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]nas 'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo

[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor [{]mying [,]ming [}]stong ba nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa

[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams

[\[221b.6\]]de ltar rnam grangs 'dis na/_'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas byung nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes par bya ste/_gnas de ni bskyod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du 
[\[221b.7\]]theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/_theg pa chen po de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor de ltar 
[\[222a\]]

[\[230a.1\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor

[\[234a.7\]]pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni/_gnas pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rnam par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab

[\[237b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med pa ni/_dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no/_/phung po dang khams dang skye mched

[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/_dmigs pa yang ma yin mi

[\[249a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]lnga [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]lnga [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med do/_/shin tu rnam

[\[249a.5\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]lnga [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]lnga [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi
