[\[249a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen pos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gnas par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bcu'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 
[\[249b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas/_de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes 
[\[249b.3\]]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_ji ltar nam mkha' sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed 
[\[249b.4\]]pas bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste/_theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'am/_gnas pa yang ma mchis sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[249b.5\]]dang /_dbus zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis la/_gnas pa yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'gro ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[249b.6\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'byung ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gnas pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/_sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[249b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_theg pa chen po 'di 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa bas/_de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[250a.2\]]drug po 'di dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[250a.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[250a.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[250a.5\]]dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[250a.6\]]nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab tu bde bar gnas pa'i ting nge 
[\[250a.7\]]'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bde bar 'dzugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'khrul pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pas 'khrul pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]brtson pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshig bla [(]dgas [,]dwags [)]la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 
[\[250b.2\]]'dzin dang /_phyogs rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting 
[\[250b.3\]]nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang po'i dpal gyi 
[\[250b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par rkyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_seng ge rnam par glal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chags pa 
[\[250b.5\]]dang thogs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_tshol ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas la rten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[250b.6\]]bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od dri 
[\[250b.7\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad pa dang bral ba'i 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'jig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[251a.2\]]shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[251a.3\]]sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_

[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems [{]myed [,]med [}]par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nges par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i

[\[251b.3\]]'dzin dang /_gnas su bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa 'dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[251b.4\]]spyod pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rin chen snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 
[\[251b.5\]]'dzin dang /_glog gi 'od zer bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgra 
[\[251b.6\]]dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 
[\[251b.7\]]'dzin dang /_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa'i za ma tog 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]gi ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[252a.2\]]mthun pa dang 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam 
[\[252a.3\]]pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'jig rten thams cad skyob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par 
[\[252a.4\]]gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 
[\[252a.5\]]'dzin dang /_snod las rang 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes chen po'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgo rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 
[\[252a.6\]]'dzin dang /_lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 
[\[252a.7\]]'dzin dang /_kun tu rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam mkha' ltar chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_rnam par grol zhing gos pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang 
[\[252b.2\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos 
[\[252b.3\]]thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[252b.4\]]chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga 
[\[252b.5\]]dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_
[\[252b.6\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi 
[\[252b.7\]]sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni/_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_
[\[253a.2\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khams te/_rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin/_ma nor ba de bzhin/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/_
[\[253a.3\]]phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/_ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 
[\[253a.4\]]'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas de'i phyir theg pa chen 
[\[253a.5\]]po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin/_ma nor ba de bzhin/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/_phyin ci log ma yin la bden 
[\[253a.6\]]pa yang dag pa ste/_ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na no/_/theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[253a.7\]]'gyur te/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/_
[\[253b\]]

[\[262a.4\]]ma nor ba de bzhin/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/_phyin ci log ma yin la/_bden pa yang dag pa ste/_ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis 
[\[262a.5\]]kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor ma rig pa de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bskyed pa/_yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan 
[\[262a.6\]]la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te 'du 
[\[262a.7\]]byed de bzhin/_ma nor ba de bzhin/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/_phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/_ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/_theg pa 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bskyed pa/_yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan la 
[\[262b.2\]]ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin/_ma

[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te

[\[263a.3\]]pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor skye mched drug de rnam par brtags pa/_rnam par bskyed pa/_yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag

[\[263b\]]

[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rga shi de bzhin/_ma nor ba de bzhin/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/_phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/_ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba'i

[\[264b.3\]]su bsgrubs pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no//_//

[\[265a.1\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha

[\[265b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du

[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[266a.7\]]kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_
[\[266b.2\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du 
[\[266b.3\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma 
[\[266b.4\]]yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas

[\[270b\]]

[\[270b.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[270b.7\]]brgyad dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal 
[\[271a.2\]]te rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor rigs 
[\[271a.3\]]kyi sa'i chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te brgya dpa'i sa'i chos dngos po yod 
[\[271a.4\]]pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor brgya dpa'i sa'i chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_
[\[271a.5\]]dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_
[\[271a.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po 
[\[271a.7\]]ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir 
[\[271b.2\]]theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis 
[\[271b.3\]]kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang 
[\[271b.4\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te dgra bcom pa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du 
[\[271b.5\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil 
[\[271b.6\]]kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil 
[\[271b.7\]]kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 
[\[272a.2\]]'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 
[\[272a.3\]]'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 
[\[272a.4\]]'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rigs kyis 
[\[272a.5\]]dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor rigs kyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos 
[\[272a.6\]]po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg 
[\[272a.7\]]pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor brgyad pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rgyun tu zhugs pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[272b.2\]]zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 
[\[272b.3\]]'byor gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor lan 
[\[272b.4\]]cig phyir 'ong ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dngos po yod pa zhig 
[\[272b.5\]]yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i 
[\[272b.6\]]phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te dgra bcom pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 
[\[272b.7\]]'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor dgra bcom pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te rang sangs rgyas dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma 
[\[273a.2\]]yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis 
[\[273a.3\]]mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar 
[\[273a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin 
[\[273a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[273a.6\]]'gyur te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis 
[\[273a.7\]]mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin 
[\[273b.2\]]nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos po ma yin 
[\[273b.3\]]pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa 
[\[273b.4\]]chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_
[\[273b.5\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[273b.6\]]du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[273b.7\]]rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha 
[\[274a.2\]]dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin cad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du sems 
[\[274a.3\]]bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor 
[\[274a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin cad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[274a.5\]]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa 
[\[274a.6\]]chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos po ma yin pas/_
[\[274a.7\]]de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu'i dngos po yod pa zhig 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par khong du chud cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_lha dang /_
[\[274b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[274b.3\]]sems dpa' chen pos bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par khong du chud de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob/_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang zil kyis mnan cing 
[\[274b.4\]]'byung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[274b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyis kyang lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing /_gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lham mer [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_lhan ner [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_lhang nger [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[274b.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_
[\[274b.7\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te/_gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lha ma me lhan ne lhang nger gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs 
[\[275a.2\]]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]mdzad de/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[275a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs par mdzad do/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po 
[\[275a.4\]]yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mdzad de/_
[\[275a.5\]]rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_dngos po ma yin pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[275a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar mdzad do/_/rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[275a.7\]]dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha 'am bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]sus kyang rung ste/_'jig rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus pa skor bar yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]de dngos po ma

[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]dang /_phyogs mtshams [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la/_shar phyogs [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_bla dang /_'og dang /_phyogs

[\[279a.1\]]mnyam pa ste/_'di ltar theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du ji ltar nam mkha' sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du/_theg pa chen po de yang sems can tshad

[\[279a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_theg pa chen po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya ste/_

[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]pa chen po dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i go 'byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang /_nam

[\[318a.5\]]kyang 'ong ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gang du yang 'gro ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni 'ong ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'gro ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gnas pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 
[\[318a.6\]]'di skad du theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi ma'i mtha' yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbus kyang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/_theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/zhes smras pa 
[\[318a.7\]]ni de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/_de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo /_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo /_/da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong ngo /_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang

[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das 
[\[321b.2\]]pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu

[\[321b.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig 
[\[321b.5\]]smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_nang stong pa 
[\[321b.6\]]nyid ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam 
[\[321b.7\]]pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi stong pa nyid ni

[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs

[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]smos/_rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dus

[\[323a.4\]]ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[323b.2\]]mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor 
[\[323b.3\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni sdon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni

[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid

[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[324b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni sngon

[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam 
[\[325a.2\]]pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor ngo bo nyid 
[\[325a.3\]]stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[325a.4\]]rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam 
[\[325a.5\]]pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi 
[\[325a.6\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum 
[\[325a.7\]]mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la de ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor 
[\[325b.2\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus

[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sdon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rdzu 'phrul gyi

[\[326a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid

[\[328a.1\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid

[\[328b\]]

[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[329a.2\]]lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 
[\[329a.3\]]la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa 
[\[329a.4\]]nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[329a.5\]]bcu ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa 
[\[329a.6\]]nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid 
[\[329a.7\]]kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa 
[\[329b.2\]]la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[329b.3\]]lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi 
[\[329b.4\]]ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[329b.5\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_
[\[329b.6\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni 
[\[329b.7\]]phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyan 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_mnyam pa 
[\[330a.2\]]nyid la 'das pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta ci zhig smos/_da ltar byung ba'i dus [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa lta yang ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_so 
[\[330a.3\]]so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[330a.4\]]yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir 
[\[330a.5\]]ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can 
[\[330a.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_byang chub 
[\[330a.7\]]sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang 
[\[330b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[330b.3\]]chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung 
[\[330b.4\]]ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 
[\[330b.5\]]'di/_legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/_bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[330b.6\]]'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad 
[\[330b.7\]]dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/_dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di 
[\[331a.2\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 
[\[331a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to/_/brnyes so brnyes par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bcu gcig go/_//
[\[331a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_de nas byams gang gi bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/_de bzhin 
[\[331a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du/_bsko ba mdzad pas/_'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom 
[\[331a.6\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gam/_gcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 
[\[331a.7\]]'byor de ltar gyur pa yang [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das dge 
[\[331b.2\]]ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa/_de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags 
[\[331b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[331b.4\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[331b.5\]]'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[331b.6\]]dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[331b.7\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang 
[\[332a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[332a.3\]{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]nyam pa'i chos nyid dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/_
[\[332a.4\]]nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[332a.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[332a.6\]]gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_'du shes gang yin pa dang /_'du byed gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam 
[\[332a.7\]]par shes pa gang yin pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_rna ba gang yin pa dang /_sgra gang yin pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_rna 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_sna gang yin pa dang /_dri gang yin pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_sna'i 'dus 
[\[332b.2\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_lce gang yin pa dang /_ro gang yin pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_lus 
[\[332b.3\]]gang yin pa dang /_reg gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_yid gang yin pa dang /_chos gang yin pa 
[\[332b.4\]]dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_sa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_chu'i khams gang yin pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams 
[\[332b.5\]]gang yin pa dang /_rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_ma rig pa gang yin pa dang /_'du byed gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa 
[\[332b.6\]]dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs gang yin pa dang /_skye mched drug gang yin pa dang /_reg pa gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_sred pa gang yin pa dang /_len pa gang yin pa dang /_srid pa gang yin pa dang /_skye ba gang yin 
[\[332b.7\]]pa dang /_rga shi gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin 
[\[333a.2\]]pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_mtha' las 
[\[333a.3\]]'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rang gi 
[\[333a.4\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dran pa 
[\[333a.5\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang /_dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang /_stobs rnams gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[333a.6\]]gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams/_gang yin pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams/_gang yin pa dang /_gzugs

[\[341b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems

[\[345a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi

[\[345b.1\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na lus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang

[\[348b.7\]]reg dben pa dang /_reg ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_reg [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_reg stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_reg dben pa yang 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]gzhan ma yin/_reg ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/
[\[349a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na reg [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_reg stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_reg dben pa gang yin pa dang /_reg ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon

[\[349a.4\]]sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 
[\[360a.2\]]dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rna ba'i 
[\[360a.3\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rna ba'i

[\[360a.7\]]gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te 
[\[360b.2\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus 
[\[360b.3\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 
[\[360b.4\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 
[\[360b.5\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i 
[\[360b.6\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sna'i 
[\[360b.7\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[361a.2\]]ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[361a.3\]]dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg 
[\[361a.4\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa 
[\[361a.5\]]dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[361a.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[361a.7\]]sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i 
[\[361b.2\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[361b.3\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[361b.4\]]tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[361b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang /_lce'i 'dus 
[\[361b.6\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_lce'i 'dus 
[\[361b.7\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang 
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_lce'i 
[\[362a.2\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[362a.3\]]kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su 
[\[362a.4\]]byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa 
[\[362a.5\]]nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[362a.6\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[362a.7\]]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[362b.2\]]sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub
