[\[362b.4\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon 
[\[362b.5\]]gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[362b.6\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[362b.7\]]yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi 
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[363a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 
[\[363a.3\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[363a.4\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[363a.5\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar 
[\[363a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid 
[\[363a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[363b.2\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[363b.3\]]tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_yid 
[\[363b.4\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_yid kyi 'dus 
[\[363b.5\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[363b.6\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang 
[\[363b.7\]]yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu lnga pa/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[364a.2\]]sa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[364a.3\]]sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i 
[\[364a.4\]]khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[364a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[364a.6\]]so/_/sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[364a.7\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_sa'i khams dben pa dang /_sa'i khams ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]sa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_sa'i khams ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[364b.2\]]sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_sa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa 
[\[364b.3\]]dang /_sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang /_sa'i khams ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang 
[\[364b.4\]]yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir 
[\[364b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[364b.6\]]sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[365a.2\]]dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_chu'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_

[\[368a.1\]]ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par shes pa'i khams [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa

[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar

[\[368b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa ngo bo nyid

[\[372b.1\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_rga shi [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_rga shi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang /_rga shi ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon

[\[376a.5\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar 
[\[376a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[376a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[376b.2\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la/_sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[376b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems 
[\[376b.4\]]dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[376b.5\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha'

[\[376b.7\]]dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang

[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan

[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

[\[379a.3\]]ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_

[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[379b.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[379b.3\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_

[\[379b.5\]]gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol

[\[379b.7\]]dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_
[\[380a.2\]]dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[380a.3\]]phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[380a.4\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub 
[\[380a.5\]]sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi

[\[380a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang 
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_

[\[380b.5\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do//_//
[\[380b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu drug pa/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa

[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_chen po stong pa 
[\[384a.2\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_chen po stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon 
[\[384a.3\]]gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_
[\[384a.4\]]chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams 
[\[384a.5\]]cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_don dam pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang

[\[384b\]]

[\[385a\]]

[\[386b\]]

[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]pa nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa

[\[387b.1\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thog ma dang

[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa

[\[391b.5\]]dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /_mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[391b.7\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[393a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'

[\[393a.3\]]sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma

[\[394a\]]
[\[394a.1\]]ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi
